review.author: DevOps (Codex)
findings: APPROVED — ERR-008 Enter delay scaling: small, focused fix.
computeScaledEnterDelayMs adds byte-proportional delay for trusted-enter Claude panes only.
Base 50ms + 1ms per 64 bytes over 256B threshold, capped at +250ms extra (300ms max total).
Non-trusted enter methods (Gemini PTY, Codex exec) correctly bypass scaling.
payloadBytes computation moved up to shared scope — no duplication.
2 new tests added (short-message base delay, long-message scaled delay). 96 tests pass across injection suites.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
